com.tmb.reports

Class ExtentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tmb.reports.ExtentManager

  • public class ExtentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ExtentManager class helps to achieve thread safety for the ExtentTest instance. Jan 21, 2021
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amuthan Sakthivel
    See Also:
    Driver

    • Method Detail

      • getExtentTest

        public static com.aventstack.extentreports.ExtentTest getExtentTest()
        Returns the thread safe ExtentTest instance fetched from ThreadLocal variable.
        Returns:
        Thread safe ExtentTest instance.

      • setExtentTest

        static void setExtentTest(com.aventstack.extentreports.ExtentTest test)
        Set the ExtentTest instance to thread local variable
        Parameters:
        test - ExtentTest instance that needs to saved from Thread safety issues.

        TODO Disallow null assignment and call unload method instead.

      • unload

        static void unload()
        Calling remove method on Threadlocal variable ensures to set the default value to Threadlocal variable. It is much safer than assigning null value to ThreadLocal variable.
